EmailTemplate.name: Netapp Follow Up - No Show & Attendee FU.Sorry We Missed You Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You: Download Recorded Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We’re sorry to have missed you at our webinar, NetApp ONTAP and VMTurbo: Aligning Virtualization with Storage – Live Demo. We understand things come up, so we recorded the webinar and made it available to you here http://bit.ly/1dibjwW. Please feel free to contact us with any questions or input into the content. We look forward to hearing from you.
Regards, VMTurbo Team
